name: Jukebox
description: Just a simple Discord music bot.

CONFIG_OWNERS.description: A Discord ID(s), use comma if you want to add more than 1 owner (DO NOT ADD SOMEONE ELSE ID THAT YOU DON'T TRUST)

CONFIG_TOTALSHARDS.description: Total shards to spawn, use 'auto' or a number (default: auto)

CONFIG_DEBUG.description: Should logging use debug level? Please note that this is not recommended in production (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_CACHE_USERS.description: Whether to cache users to memory (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_ALLOW_DUPLICATE.description: Whether to allow users to add duplicate of tracks (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_DELETE_QUEUE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds before queue is deleted when no one is in the voice channel (default: 180 <3 minutes>)

CONFIG_SELECT_TIMEOUT.description: Select track timeout when searching tracks (in seconds) (default: 20)

CONFIG_DISABLE_SONG_SELECTION.description: Whether to disable selecting tracks on play command, this will automatically selects the first track from search results (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum tracks to list in track selection (default: 12, max: 12)

CONFIG_ENABLE_INLINE_VOLUME.description: Enable inline volume feature or not (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_DEFAULT_VOLUME.description: Default volume for music (Requires CONFIG_ENABLE_INLINE_VOLUME to be enabled) (default: 100)

CONFIG_MAX_VOLUME.description: Max volume allowed for music (Requires CONFIG_ENABLE_INLINE_VOLUME to be enabled) (default: 100)

CONFIG_CACHE_YOUTUBE_DOWNLOADS.description: Whether to download and cache tracks from youtube (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_CACHE_MAX_LENGTH.description: Max track length in seconds that are allowed to be cached (default: 5400 <1 hour 30 minutes>)

CONFIG_DISABLE_INVITE_CMD.description: Whether to disable the invite command or not (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_STATUS_TYPE.description: What type of status does the bot use (playing, listening, or watching) (default: listening)

CONFIG_STATUS_ACTIVITY.description: What status does the bot display (default: 'music on {guildsCount} guilds!') (available variables: guildsCount, usersCount, playingCount, and botPrefix). NOTE ON {usersCount} VARIABLE: The value will be 0 if CONFIG_CACHE_USERS is not set to yes
